name: Evolution (itch) (Genetic Games)
description:
Through the eye piece of a microscope, you aim to witness evolution of a wily bacteria first-hand.

This top-down 2-dimensional single player game puts you in the tiny driver seat behind a single mutated bacteria hell-bent on being nothing short of the fittest to survive in the whole, wide petri dish.

Feel free to donate if you liked the game so we can keep creating new ones! For anything at all, send us some feedback directly or write to us in the comments below! For those of you that have sent us feedback or donations so far, thank you for reaching out, we really appreciate it.

Evolution is the proud, first release by Genetic Games! Many more games are on the horizon, and we are always looking for more contributors, so reach out if you want to join us and create games of your own!

To play in browser: Visit our website!
